0: The staff is the first thing that stands out with their professionalism and friendliness
Staff is very helpful and the decor is fabulous
Great pull area and pool side service is 1st class
A women from room service brought our dinner and was extremely nice
Excellent service very attentive and friendly service
The fifth star goes to the staff

The housekeeping staff was excellent right down to the lady cleaning the bathroom who noticed we needed bags for wet clothes we were changing out of swimsuits on the way to the airport after we had checked out
1: Junior and senior staff brief you different rules
I have rarely met that kind of impeccable service across the entire hotel
Staff nice talking but not caring about you
There may be no other big hotels that provide such perfect service in Miami and also …

But the key factor apart from the superb service is that this hotel being a big property enjoys economies of scale and so they can provide a great service AS WELL AS THE LOCATION while being the size they are
We were so used to Mr Ts great service
The concierge offerings were far beyond most I have experienced
Overall all the staff try very hard and the service is good but the prices are outrageous even for South Beach

Located at the front of Lincoln Road Mall shops restaurantsBeach chairs and umbrellas bikes are included in RESORT FEE which should just be included in your rate in my opinion secured entrance to from the beachRC Mariot Brand Stuff staff was helpful but only 90 greeted us in the halls
2: It was not quiet as the staff at the front desk suggested it would be and we heard the units running our entire 5 night stay
Now what it lacks in grand showmanship in the facade it more than makes up with the 5star service
I like how the front desk workers will give out your room key to your own friends and violate their rules and my rights with proof of identificationEverything
Want to mention Randy at the beach superb service and personality
We have stayed in the city and never enjoyed the amenities and service before just really slept there
At 7 pm called for clean towels and only then did they know the room had not been serviced
after I pulled out my luggage on my own i had to sak if there was nt a bellhop
Had we been told before we were fully set up it might have been different too but to set us up and then return and tell us is just terrible service and frankly rude
The service was extremely poor and the food was just mediocre
